author: Nintendo of America
description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows is available now for Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/assassins-creed-shadows-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

Unleash your inner Assassin as Naoe and strike from the shadows, or take command as Yasuke and dominate the battlefield. Whether you're at home or on the go, enjoy cross-progression and touchscreen support in all menus. Your journey through the breathtaking world of feudal Japan begins today!  

#NintendoSwitch2 #AssassinsCreedShadows 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Tetris® 99 50th MAXIMUS CUP event runs from 11 p.m. PT on December 4 to 10:59 p.m. PT on December 8. To participate, you’ll need to be a Nintendo Switch Online member* and play the Tetris 99 online mode during the event period. You’ll earn event points based on your placement in each match. Once you’ve accumulated a total of 100 event points, a new theme will unlock, featuring art, music and Tetrimino designs inspired by the Kirby Air Riders game that is exclusive to the Nintendo Switch 2 system!

*Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. This game includes an in-game purchase option for users who do not have a membership. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

title: Tetris® 99 – 50th MAXIMUS CUP Gameplay Trailer - Nintendo Switch
